sentences.en: Paraphrase the ancient Chinese prose in colloquialism language.
sentences.cn: 把这篇古文译成白话文.

sentences.en: Paraphrase the ancient Chinese prose in vernacular language.
sentences.cn: 把这篇古文译成白话文。

sentences.en: Paraphrase the following passage into two paragraphs.
sentences.cn: 把下面这一节文章意译成两段.

sentences.en: Paraphrase the following sentences or parts of sentences using your own words.
sentences.cn: 用你自己的话解释下面的句子或句子的一部分.

sentences.en: Parents, to paraphrase Philip Larkin, can seriously damage your health.
sentences.cn: 菲利普·拉金的意思是：父母可能会严重损害你的健康。

sentences.en: She gave us a paraphrase of that film.
sentences.cn: 她向我们复述了那部电影.

sentences.en: The following is a paraphrase of a cable I have today sent to General Eisenhower.
sentences.cn: 以下是我今天发给艾森豪威尔将军一封电报的大意.

sentences.en: The following is a paraphrase of what was said.
sentences.cn: 下面是对刚才说过的话的阐释。

sentences.en: The last two clauses were an exact quote rather than a paraphrase of Mr. Forth's remarks.
sentences.cn: 最后两个分句是对福思先生言论的准确引用而不是改述。

sentences.en: The methods include the following four categories: transliteration, translation, adjustment and paraphrase.
sentences.cn: 这些翻译方法主要包括以下四类: 音译 、 直译 、 调整、意译.

sentences.en: The teacher amplified the sense by a paraphrase.
sentences.cn: 老师用转述释义的方法详述了它的意义.

sentences.en: Then in the yellow light he'd point to pictures and paraphrase the news items.
sentences.cn: 在黄色的灯光下,他手指着一张张图片,讲解一条条新闻.

sentences.en: To achieve this, active listeners rely heavily on paraphrase.
sentences.cn: 为了做到这一点, 主动的听者经常反复听者的意思.

sentences.en: To paraphrase a famous bear: Only you can prevent grease fires.
sentences.cn: 改写一头非常出名的熊说过的话: 只有你才能防止火灾.

sentences.en: To paraphrase Finkelstein, mathematics is a language, like English.
sentences.cn: 芬克尔斯坦的意思是，数学是一门语言，就像英语一样。

sentences.en: Try to paraphrase the question before you answer it.
sentences.cn: 先试解释一下问题再作回答。

sentences.en: You may read the prose paraphrase of this poem.
sentences.cn: 你可以看一下这首诗的散文释义.
